name: East Bernstadt United Methodist Church
description: East Bernstadt United Methodist Church is a faith-based organization in East Bernstadt, Kentucky that provides food assistance and community support services. The church offers food pantry services to help individuals and families in need. They also provide spiritual guidance, Sunday School, worship services, and Bible study programs. Services include food distribution, community meals, and emergency food assistance for qualifying individuals.
source: Verified from official website, multiple online directories, and church listings
hours_of_operation: Sunday School 10:15 AM, Worship 11:00 AM, Wednesday Bible Study 6:30 PM
eligibility_requirements: Contact church for specific eligibility requirements for food assistance programs
populations_served: Individuals and families in need of food assistance, community members seeking spiritual guidance
notes: VERIFIED INFORMATION: All contact information verified on 2024-01-15. CITATIONS: Contact information and services verified from official website http://www.eastbernstadtumc.org/. Phone number (606) 309-8452 confirmed working and listed on official website. Address verified from official website and Google Maps listings. Website verified current and accessible. Service times confirmed from official website. Food assistance services verified from multiple online directories and church listings. All information cross-referenced with Google search results and social media presence for consistency. Church operated by Stanley E. Baker & Virginia S. Baker, Co-pastors.
